text: Bengt Nilsson (born 4 September 1954) is a Swedish rower. He competed in the men's single sculls event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Sweden Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:People from Landskrona Municipality
title: Bengt Nilsson (rower)
